experience.title: Traditional Cooking Classes in Kerala
experience.description: Learn to prepare authentic Kerala cuisine in a traditional cooking class led by local chefs. Master the art of making coconut-based curries, fish molee, appam, and puttu while discovering the secrets of Kerala spices. This hands-on workshop includes a visit to spice gardens, market tour, and a delicious meal of your prepared dishes.
